name: benthonic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
living in or relating to the lowest levels of the sea or other body of water: The smaller estuaries are poor in benthonic organisms compared to the deeper lagoons and lakes, where the aquatic life is stirred up by midwestern winds. Smaller crustaceans thrive in that part of the ocean, deep in the benthonic zone. Synonym
benthic
More examplesFewer examplesThe deeper parts of the bay are home to many species of benthonic invertebrates, including sea urchins and sponges.
